None.Name: Elemental Balls
None.Description: Every 4 seconds, unit hurls an elemental ball that deals 112 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 168 in total. Knocks back small, medium and large units.

None.Name: Gifted Radiance
None.Description: Upon dying the unit will release its elemental powers and infuse them into its environment. Friendly units will regenerate 10% of their life points every second for up to 1000 life points in total. Lasts for 15 seconds.
